metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19199 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in uriparser before 0.9.0. UriQuery.c allows aninteger overflow via a uriComposeQuery* or uriComposeQueryEx* functionbecause of an unchecked multiplication.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19199` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liburiparser1 - 0.7.5-1ubuntu2+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: uriparser package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.7.5-1ubuntu2+esm1').
